message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $90. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $110. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $110 is a bit too high. Would you be willing to meet me at $100?
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $105. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's a fair compromise. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of my target. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $95?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $105, Bob. I think that's a fair price considering the value the product brings. I'm willing to make one more compromise, though. I'll meet you at $102. That's as low as I can go. What do you think?
